title: Naan Bombay Ponnu Lyrics Vedi Song Lyrics
singerName: Mamtha Sharma, MLR Karthikeyan, Senthil Dass
stanzas:
Singers: Mamtha Sharma, MLR.Karthikeyan, Senthil Dass
Song: Bombay Ponnu

Naan bombay ponnu,
lucknow lucknow lucknow, idhu lucknow kannu
Jiginna jinnu,
Em pinnala, Em-munnala, Em KaiMela emmela
Mela mela mela mela mela

Kaarakudi gaanaavo naan kavundhadhu un kannaala
Thoothukudi aan yaaru naan vilundhuputtan munnala
Mela mela mela mela mela
Mela mela mela mela mela

Mein bombay ponnu,
lucknow lucknow lucknow, idhu lucknow kannu
Jiginna jinnu

Alcohol-lu en kaalu, Aatu paalu en thozhu
sexy yaana sendhelu, sixty litre petrol-lu
Mathalam thaan pinnaadi, Maada pura munnaadi
Kaal mulacha kannaadi, Unmaya nee ponnadi  ..(Kaarakudi gaanaavo..)

Naan bombay ponnu, [mel mela]
lucknow lucknow lucknow, idhu lucknow kannu [mel mela]
Jiginna jinnu

Moochu vaangum moonaaru, Moodi vacha paalaaru
Noothuku naan 500-ru, theepidicha thanneeru
Saamburaani un maeni, Un siripu symphoni
Pallu vella pattaani
....

Kaarakudi gaanaavo naan kavundhadhu un kannaala
Thoothukudi aan yaaru naan vilundhuputtan munnala
Mela mela mela mela mela me la la mela mela
Mela mela mela mela mela

Naan bombay ponnu, [mel mela]
lucknow lucknow lucknow, idhu lucknow kannu [mel mela]
Jiginna jinnu [mela]
